title: Update WhatsApp contact number

requirements.text: Replace the WhatsApp phone number from +91 98765 43210 to 9040117361 in the HomePage component, ensuring the wa.me URL format is maintained
acceptanceCriteria: The WhatsApp link uses phone number 9040117361
The wa.me URL format is preserved
The emergency support message template remains unchanged

constraints: Maintain the existing wa.me URL format
Do not modify the pre-filled message content
nonGoals: Changing the emergency support message template
Modifying other phone numbers in the application
Altering the WhatsApp button styling or placement
